item.title: Lisa add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Lisa add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Paulo Coelho / پائولو کوئیلیو
item.description: "Kalau seseorang sungguh-sungguh menginginkan sesuatu, seisi jagat raya bahu-membahu membantu orang itu memuwudkan impiannya." -- Paulo Coelho / پائولو کوئیلیو

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Henry Miller
item.description: "Let me be, was all I wanted. Be what I am, no matter how I am." -- Henry Miller

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Gilda Radner
item.description: "I wanted a perfect ending. Now I've learned, the hard way, that some poems don't rhyme, and some stories don't have a clear beginning, middle, and end. Life is about not knowing, having to change, taking the moment and making the best of it, without knowing what's going to happen next. Delicious Ambiguity." -- Gilda Radner

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "A good traveler has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Mary Oliver
item.description: "Listen--are you breathing just a little, and calling it a life?" -- Mary Oliver

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "But life is a battle: may we all be enabled to fight it well!" -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane

item.title: Lisa add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us. And the world will live as one." -- John Lennon

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "First they ignore you, then they ridicule you, then they fight you, and then you win." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "In the name of God, stop a moment, cease your work, look around you." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Everything you can imagine is real." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everyone." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Ask for what you want and be prepared to get it!" -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "Bermimpilah, karena Tuhan akan memeluk mimpi-mimpi itu." -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dan Zadra
item.description: "No one can go back and make a brand new start, my friend, but anyone can start from here and make a brand new end." -- Dan Zadra

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Theocritus
item.description: "Sameron adion aso I shall sing a sweeter song tomorrow" -- Theocritus
